description.value:
When ingested must make -20 Toughness Test or immediately fall into a coma for 3d10 hours. Tests to find any signs of life on the user have -30 (Such as Awareness, Medicae, or Scrutiny). Can awaken someone under this effect with -20 Medicae Test, if failed can try again after an hour.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -

Tests to find any signs of life on the user have -30 (Such as Awareness, Medicae, or Scrutiny). Can awaken someone under this effect with -20 Medicae Test, if failed can try again after an hour.
